title: Palestine Thanks India For $2.5 Million Financial Aid To Its UN Agency
content: Palestine on Tuesday expressed its deep gratitude to India for releasing the second tranche of $2.5 million financial aid to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East (UNRWA).
summary: Palestine on Tuesday expressed its deep gratitude to India for releasing the second tranche of $2.5 million financial aid to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East (UNRWA).

title: Here's Why Musk's SpaceX Steps In To Launch India's GSAT-N2 Satellite
content: Elon Musk's SpaceX launched GSAT-20 - ISRO's latest communications satellite from Cape Canaveral in Florida on November 19th. The launch had utilised Space X's Falcon 9 rocket.
summary: Elon Musk's SpaceX launched GSAT-20 - ISRO's latest communications satellite from Cape Canaveral in Florida on November 19th. The launch had utilised Space X's Falcon 9 rocket.

title: Ukraine Fired US Ballistic Missiles At Army Facility, Says Russia: Report
content: Russia's military said Tuesday that Ukraine fired US-supplied long-range missiles at a military facility in the Bryansk border region, in what would be the first attack since Washington authorised the use of its weapons.
summary: Russia's military said Tuesday that Ukraine fired US-supplied long-range missiles at a military facility in the Bryansk border region, in what would be the first attack since Washington authorised the use of its weapons.

title: Zelensky Says By 2025 World Will Know The Winner Of Russia-Ukraine War
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Tuesday that 2025 will be decisive in determining who wins the war unleashed by Russia almost three years ago.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Tuesday that 2025 will be decisive in determining who wins the war unleashed by Russia almost three years ago.

title: Opinion: The Logistics Of Trump's Deportation Dream Are Not So Pretty

title: Vladimir Putin To Visit India Soon, Dates Being Finalised, Says Kremlin
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin will visit India soon, the Kremlin said today, adding that Moscow and New Delhi are "working on the dates".

title: Exclusive: What American Diplomat Said On Attacks At Indian Consulates In US

title: Emergency Landing, Fliers Stuck For 3 Days In Phuket; Air India Responds
content: Over 100 New Delhi-bound passengers of an Air India flight have been stranded in Thailand's Phuket for over 80 hours now after several delays due to technical faults, according to multiple posts put out by passengers on social media

title: Apple Offers $100 Million To Undo Indonesia iPhone 16 Ban
content: Apple Inc. has increased its offer to invest in Indonesia by almost tenfold, according to people familiar with the matter, in the US tech giant's latest bid to persuade the government to lift its sales ban on the iPhone 16.
summary: Apple Inc. has increased its offer to invest in Indonesia by almost tenfold, according to people familiar with the matter, in the US tech giant's latest bid to persuade the government to lift its sales ban on the iPhone 16.
